param.name: pcbPatternsActual
param.para: Receives the actual buffer size needed to retrieve all pattern signatures supported by the decoder.

returns.para: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

remarks.para: To retrieve all pattern signatures, this method should first be called with pPatterns set to NULL to retrieve the actual buffer size needed through pcbPatternsActual. Once the needed buffer size is known, allocate a buffer of the needed size and call GetPatterns again with the allocated buffer.
